about

Who the heck are you?

My name is Austin. I play guitar when life lets me. This is where I just put all of my thoughts and just not give a damn. Someone may this helpful, others won’t. Making music and noise is a passion and I love every moment of it.


Brands I Use


Austin Riendeau

I make noise, sometimes call it music. I have background in Violin, Guitar and Bass.

Denver, Colorado http://riptide-rhythm.com
